price: Dan janganlah kamu jadikan sumpah-sumpahmu sebagai alat penipu di antaramu yang menyebabkan tergelincir kaki(mu) sesudah kokoh tegaknya dan kamu rasakan kemelaratan (di dunia) karena kamu menghalangi (manusia) dari jalan Allah dan bagimu azab yang besar.
arabic: وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَكُمۡ دَخَلَۢا بَيۡنَكُمۡ فَتَزِلَّ قَدَمُۢ بَعۡدَ ثُبُوتِهَا وَتَذُوقُواْ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِمَا صَدَدتُّمۡ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَكُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tattakhidhū aymānakum dakhalan baynakum fatazilla qadamun baʿda thubūtihā watadhūqū al-sūa bimā ṣadadttum ʿan sabīli al-lahi walakum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
